Row 5: Alan Tait. Int'l debut is "RWC v France" in 1987 and cross code debut is "RLWC Great Britain v Australia" on 24 Oct 1992. No match here.

Row 6: Andy Craig. Int'l debut is "RL Test v Wales" in 1999, cross code debut is "RU Test v Canada" on 15 Jun 2002. No relevance.

So, looking for a row where both the int'l debut is "RU Five Nations v Ireland" and the cross code debut is "RL 1st Test Great Britain v Australia" on 13 Nov 1954.

From the table, only Row 3 has the int'l debut of "RU Five Nations v Ireland", but his cross code debut is in 1948. So the date doesn't match.

Row 4 has a player (David Rose) with a cross code debut on 13 Nov 1954, but his int'l debut isn't against Ireland, it's against France.
